content: what a quick and easy baby blanket to crochet for a new arrival the pattern is easy to remember and will create that mind numbing soothing rhythm that easily washes the cares of the day away it takes just one ball of bernat baby yarn with a change in hook size you can easily make a larger blanket in worsted weight yarn all info on how to embellish and use worsted weight yarn is included i the pattern there is a chart included in the pattern to help you along
